name: Grompula
description: Grompula is a high octane wave based survival game. Fight through endless waves of Grompuloids to save the Glorkon race, and banish Grompula back to limbo, where he belongs. With tons of weapons, items, and abilities at your disposal, you might just be able to claim back what's rightfully yours.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: AMD Opteron 248 2.2Ghz 1MB L2 Cache 1.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Evga - GeForce 210 1GB DDR3 PCI Express 2.0 Graphics Card equivalent or greater Storage: 100 MB available space
